content: ~ erattadec2019 just a note to say that there may be errors in the stitch counts of this pattern apologies but i will not be making corrections to the pattern please read notes in pattern re how a ladder is made before messaging me with questions when dropping any stitch follow the path of the stitch about to be dropped and check that it lines up with a m1 use pattern at your own risk thanks inspired by erika knight s earthly 1 pullover this shawl worked from the top down features a combination of dropped ladder stitches and yo eyelet holes to create it s torn tattered look the sport weight wool/bamboo yarn knitted on a slightly larger needle gives this shawl wonderful drape and sheen looks great on both women and men thank you to hummel456 2 for kindly translating tattered to german pattern is written out row by row 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/earthly 2 http //www ravelry com/people/hummel456
